p: Finally, another compound marketed for treating skin lesions caused by HSV-1 is Novitra Â®, which consists of a zinc oxide-based cream. This compound has been shown to reduce HSV-1 skin lesions by up to 1.5 days, compared to untreated individuals ( Godfrey et al., 2001). Other aspects, such as pain formation and itching, were also shown to be improved with its use. Table 1 summarizes the antiviral compounds discussed above.
